meanings.definition: Preserve (food) in a vinegar or brine solution.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy pickling cucumbers to make crunchy pickles.
meanings.sent2: My grandma taught me how to pickle vegetables for the winter.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the pickling solution all over the kitchen!
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like pickling jars, preserving moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The art of pickling adds a burst of flavor to bland vegetables.

meanings.definition: Treat (metal) with a chemical solution to remove impurities or prevent rust.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith was pickling the iron to protect it from corrosion.
meanings.sent2: Pickling steel is an important step in the manufacturing process.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy apprentice accidentally spilled the pickling solution on his shoes.
meanings.sent4: The pickling process revealed the true shine of the metal beneath.
meanings.sent5: The pickling solution bubbled as it worked its magic on the rusty metal.
